thread.title: Playful tiger knocks drone out of the sky in China
thread.title_full: Playful tiger knocks drone out of the sky in China

author: Associated Press
title: Playful tiger knocks drone out of the sky in China
text:
C hina's state broadcaster on Wednesday released footage from a Siberian tiger enclosure in Heilongjiang Province, showing the animals chasing a drone until one successfully jumps up and knocks it out of the sky. According to the report, experts in the park use drone chasing to help keep the well-nourished tigers fit. 
Video block text
